ADDED

The Association of PhD students and Doctors
of the Doctoral Schools PSIME & MIIS
at Rouen & le Havre

know more about

About

The association of the PhD students and doctors of the Doctoral Schools PSIME and MIIS at Rouen & Le Havre is a community and a network of researchers, competence, innovation, creativity and enterprise

Our association aims to create interactions and connections between PhD students and young doctors of the Doctoral Schools PSIME/MIIS, during and after the PhD.

  • github

JDD 2017, 9ème édition.

The 9th edition of the JDD which will take place in June, 13-14th, 2017 in Saint-Etienne du Rouvray, Technopole du Madrillet, Université de Rouen Normandie.

This year, as a consequence of the fusion of the doctoral schools SPMII (Rouen/Le Havre) and SIMEM (Caen/Cherbourg), the JDD format has slightly changed. The number of the PhD students concerned by this JDD has been doubled. Therefore, we choose to extend the period of the JDD from one day to two days in order to give the chance to all the PhD students to present their work.

The JDDs are organized by the associations: ADDED (Association des Doctorants et Docteurs des Écoles Doctorales PSIME & MIIS sur Rouen & Le Havre) and OPTIC (Organisation Pour les Thésards Interdisciplinaire de Caen). The JDDs are sponsored by the Doctoral schools PSIME et MIIS.

know more about

New Doctor?

Congratulations! you obtained your doctor diploma.

In order to create a newtork between doctors, we initiated the creation of a database of doctors from the Doctoral Schools (SPIME, MIIS, SPMII) and its different laboratories. By filling this form, you are participating in the creation of this network. We thank you for that. Your contact will be kept private. We will put you in touch with people who want to join you.

Fill in the form

Doctors' network

You will find in this page a list of doctors from the Doctoral Schools: PSIME, MIIS, SPMII. The list is organized by PhD defense year. The purpose behind this list is to create a network between PhD students, young doctors and former PhD students (job opportunities, feedback...).

If you would like their contact, please contact us : association.added@gmail.com

** Under construction **

Download the list (*.pdf)

Send us a message

You can contact us through: letter, e-mail, phone. You can, also, come to visit us in our office which is located at the UFR des Sciences et Techniques at Rouen.
